thread.title: McDonald’s is lowering the price of its soft drinks and McCafe beverages as the fast food giant suffers a global slump
thread.title_full: McDonald’s is lowering the price of its soft drinks and McCafe beverages as the fast food giant suffers a global slump

author: sbarns
title: McDonald’s is lowering the price of its soft drinks and McCafe beverages as the fast food giant suffers a global slump
text:
Mrs Crunch (Milk)shake up McDonald’s is lowering the price of its soft drinks and McCafe beverages as the fast food giant suffers a global slump 
The fast food giant is reducing the cost of its fizzy beverages and coffee items in US-based stores starting in April By SARAH BARNS
